para.para: This class contains methods, to parse and returns safed data from device.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: This class contains methods, to parse and returns safed data from device.

Author
Staacke, Felix
this class discribes the type FileHandler ATTENTION: this type is not runnable!!!! Method Overview

Identity visibility return type method name note td border-bottom: 2px solid black; text-postition: justify;">MyFileHandler.MyFileHandler() public none MyFileHandler.MyFileHandler() Constructor of the class
Message data relation := (messageType:int, messageDate:String, messageTime:String, messageContent:String, messageUserId:int, messageIsDeleted:boolean ) MyFileHandler.parseDirectChatCSV() public ArrayList MyFileHandler.parseDirectChatCSV(path : String) This method parses the file on divice with value parameter path. This method copy data line per line. Than the data of a single line are used to generate a new instance of DirectChat. This DirectChat become added into the DirectChat typed Array-List. This Array List become returned.

MyFileHandler.parseDirectChatMessageCSV() public ArrayList MyFileHandler.parseDirectChatMessageCSV(path : String, idx : int) This method parses the file on divice with value parameter path. This method copy data line per line. Than the data of a single line are used to generate a new instance of DirectMessage. This DirectMessage become added into the DirectMessage typed Array-List. This Array List become returned. MyFileHandler.parseMessageCSV() public ArrayList MyFileHandler.parseMessageCSV(path : String) This method parses the file on divice with value parameter path. This method copy data line per line. Than the data of a single line are used to generate a new instance of Message. This Message become added into the Message typed Array-List. This Array List become returned.

MyFileHandler.parseUserCSV() public ArrayList MyFileHandler.parseUserCSV(path : String) This method parses the file on divice with value parameter path. This method copy data line per line. Than the data of a single line are used to generate a new instance of User. This User become added into the User typed Array-List. This Array List become returned. MyFileHandler.parseRoomsCSV() public ArrayList MyFileHandler.parseRooms(path : String) This method parses the file on divice with value parameter path. This method copy data line per line. Than the data of a single line are used to generate a new instance of Room. This Room become added into the Room typed Array-List. This Array List become returned.

MyFileHandler.parseLogs() public ArrayList MyFileHandler.parseLogs(path : String) This method parses the file on divice with value parameter path. This method copy data line per line. Than the data of a single line are used to generate a new instance of Log. This Log become added into the Log typed Array-List. This Array List become returned. MyFileHandler.parseServerCFG() public String[] MyFileHandler.parseServerCFG(path : String) This method parses the file on divice with value of parameter path. This method copy data line per line into a string-typed-array. The string become returned.

MyFileHandler.parseSitzung() public int MyFileHandler.parseSitzung(path : Path) This method parse the file on divice with value of parameter path. Than it returns the value of sitzung casted into int. MyFileHandler.appendToFile() public none MyFileHandler.appendToFile(path:String, content:String) This method appends the value of the parameter content to the file on device with the relative path.

MyFileHandler.overwriteFile() public void MyFileHandler.overwriteFile(path:String, idx:int, content:String) This is first kind of MyFileHandler.overwriteFile(). MyFileHandler.overwriteFile() public void MyFileHandler.overwriteFile(path:String, idx:int) This is an overloaded alternative to MyFileHandler.overwriteFile().

MyFileHandler.overwriteSitzung() public none MyFileHandler.overwriteSitzung(path:String, sitzung:int) This method overwrite the content of the file on device with relative Path path. The old value should be replaced with value of the parameter sitzung.
